system.description: The character can channel their faith to turn near-misses into devastating strikes.
system.benefit: Once per Combat Encounter, character can spend a Fate Point to change the result of a 1 on a single damage die from a ranged attack to a 10. This can then inflict Righteous Fury as normal.
